full_summary:
### Elder Services Tender Announcement

#### Project Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites the submission of a statement of capabilities for Elder Services under contract number [reference number: PW-22-01014964]. This procurement is set-aside for an Indigenous Supplier under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).

#### Procurement Requirements

The successful supplier will provide Elder Services to assist Indigenous offenders in their traditional healing journey, interacting with them through teaching, guidance, and traditional ceremonies and practices. The Elder will work in collaboration with the Institutional Head and other departmental staff to provide the required services.

#### Tasks and Deliverables

*   Provide ceremonial and spiritual services to Indigenous offenders through group or individual sessions.
*   Conduct spiritual services and various traditional ceremonies based on their teachings.
*   Attend case conferences and provide verbally to the Case Management Team information regarding the offender's participation in a healing path.
*   Participate in regional and national meetings to provide advice, guidance, and information on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices.

#### Essential Requirements

*   Be recognized by their community as an Elder/Cultural Advisor.
*   Possess a minimum of five (5) years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous people.
*   Demonstrate a thorough understanding of traditional Indigenous culture, including ceremonies and protocols.
*   Have a high level of communication skills to provide advice and guidance to staff and offenders.
*   Possess the ability to conduct a variety of ceremonies with a focus on healing, based on their teachings.

#### Assessment Criteria

Statements of capabilities will be evaluated based on the above essential requirements. Additional information such as a curriculum vitae or reference letter may be requested to support the supplier's knowledge and experience.

#### Closing Date and Deadline

The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is December 13, 2022 at 2:00 PM PST. Any statements received after this deadline will not be considered.
